trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Florence
There were no other sightings in Florence on or around July 11th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsi was outside with my boyfriend on my back porch when i seen two orange orbs out the corner of my eye in the didtance. they were falling from the sky slowly with long firetrails. it almost looked like a firework when its falling to the ground. i thought it might be shooting stars, but they were side by side and then they just stopped in mid-air and were hovering. i could see that one would get really small, like i still saw the light of the orb but it was very small, then it would go back to regular size. then they kinda starting moving a little and one had a tiny firetrail. i stood there and watched them for at least 5 minutes. then they literally just disappered. then i seen a plane in the sky right after that. i know the airport is that way, but i KNOW it wasnt anything from earth. i have become a true beliver of aliens.
Summary: two orange 'orbs' were in the sky with a firetrail and were hovering in the sky for a few minutes.
